channel.title: I wish I was a lean, mean, Zine machine
channel.description:
I like making things, and this caught my eye. You have probably seen the annual Zine Quest prompt from Kickstarter, already here https://www.kickstarter.com/zinequest It is a call for RPG Zine-like projects.
Is anyone excited about this here?
Is here the right place to talk about this?

item.title: I wish I was a lean, mean, Zine machine
item.dc:creator: @ex1st
item.description:
@ex1st wrote:

Thanks for the pointer!

Read full topic
